text: Cnex is an animated programme on the Welsh channel S4C. ==Overview== The show was written by Paul Lewis and Keith Rees. Cnex animates Welsh celebrities including, Bryn Terfel, Glyn Wise, Rhodri Morgan, Charlotte Church, Gavin Henson, Dai Jones, Iolo Williams and Siân Lloyd. == References == == External links == * Cnex's website on S4C * Cnex on IMDb Category:British adult animated comedy television series
title: Cnex
